array.string:
The quizzes in this application follow rules based on the High School variant of the National Department of Energy's National Science BowlÂ®.
Each quiz contains questions on astronomy, biology, chemistry, earth science, general science, mathematics, and physics.

Use the Play menu to access saved quizzes and enter into a new game.
Use the Download menu to download new quizzes.
Use the Score menu to view previous scores.
Use the Review menu to access previous quizzes.
